I was looking for a modern HTML/Bootstrap template for my project and after exhausting research on the internet finally, find the “Raino Theme”. It is classic, light, and well documented. The theme had good "page speed ranking" on google, contains a lot of front-page variations, prompt support by the designer, and Bootstrap 5 elements for a professional website design.
